The cancellation token to cancel operation.
member.returns: representing the async operation containing a with the requested tokens.

member.summary: Optional unique identifier of the target API to access.

member.name: T:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.DeviceCodeResponse
member.summary: Represents the response from a Device Authorization request.

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.DeviceCodeResponse.DeviceCode
member.summary: The unique code for the device. When the user goes to the in their browser-based device, this code will be bound to their session.

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.DeviceCodeResponse.UserCode
member.summary: The code that should be input at the to authorize the device.

member.summary: The URL the user should visit to authorize the device.

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.DeviceCodeResponse.ExpiresIn
member.summary: The lifetime (in seconds) of the and .

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.DeviceCodeResponse.Interval
member.summary: The interval (in seconds) at which the app should poll the token URL to request a token.

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.DeviceCodeResponse.VerificationUriComplete
member.summary: The complete URL the user should visit to authorize the device. This allows embedding the in the URL.

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.ImpersonationRequest.Token

member.summary: Optional scope for the access request.

member.name: T:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.TokenBase
member.summary: Base class for all authentication tokens.

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.TokenBase.AccessToken
member.summary: Access token.

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.TokenBase.TokenType
member.summary: Type of token.

member.name: T:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.UserInfo
member.summary: Represents user information returned from a standard OpenID Connect `/userinfo` endpoint.
member.remarks: See http://openid.net/specs/openid-connect-core-1_0.html#StandardClaims for more details.

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.UserInfo.UserId
member.summary: Subject-Identifier for the user at the issuer. A unique value to identify the user.

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.UserInfo.FullName
member.summary: Full name of the user in displayable form including all name parts, possibly including titles and suffixes, ordered according to the user's locale and preferences.

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.UserInfo.FirstName
member.summary: Given name(s) or first name(s) of the user.
member.remarks: May contain multiple given names separated by space characters.

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.UserInfo.LastName
member.summary: Surname(s) or last name(s) of the user.
member.remarks: May contain multiple given names separated by space characters or no family name at all.

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.UserInfo.MiddleName
member.summary: Middle name(s) of the user.
member.remarks: May contain multiple middle names separated by space characters.

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.UserInfo.NickName
member.summary: Casual name of the user that may or may not be the same as .
member.example: Nickname of 'Mike' might be returned for a of `Michael`.

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.UserInfo.PreferredUsername
member.summary: Shorthand name by which the user wishes to be referred to at the RP, such as janedoe or j.doe.
member.remarks: MAY be any valid JSON string including special characters such as @, /, or whitespace. You MUST NOT rely upon this value being unique.

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.UserInfo.Profile
member.summary: URL of the user's profile page.
member.remarks: The contents of this Web page SHOULD be about the End-User.

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.UserInfo.Picture
member.summary: URL of the user's profile picture.
member.remarks: Note that this URL SHOULD specifically reference a profile photo of the End-User suitable for displaying when describing the user, rather than an arbitrary photo taken by the user.

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.UserInfo.Website
member.summary: URL of the user's Web page or blog.
member.remarks: This Web page SHOULD contain information published by the End-User or an organization that the End-User is affiliated with.

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.UserInfo.Email
member.summary: User's preferred e-mail address.
member.remarks: You MUST NOT rely upon this value being unique.

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.UserInfo.EmailVerified
member.summary: Whether the user's email address has been verified or not.
member.remarks: When this Claim Value is true, this means that the OP took affirmative steps to ensure that this e-mail address was controlled by the user at the time the verification was performed. The means by which an e-mail address is verified is context-specific, and dependent upon the trust framework or contractual agreements within which the parties are operating.

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.UserInfo.Gender
member.summary: User's gender.
member.remarks: Values defined by the specification include `female` and `male`. Other values MAY be used when neither of the defined values are applicable.

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.UserInfo.Birthdate
member.summary: Gets or sets the user's birthday, represented as an ISO 8601:2004 [ISO86012004] YYYY-MM-DD format. The year MAY be 0000, indicating that it is omitted. To represent only the year, YYYY format is allowed.

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.UserInfo.ZoneInformation
member.summary: User's time zone as a "tz database name".
member.remarks: See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_tz_database_time_zones for more details.

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.UserInfo.Locale
member.summary: User's locale, represented as a BCP47 language tag.
member.remarks: Typically an ISO 639-1 Alpha-2 language code in lowercase and an ISO 3166-1 Alpha-2 country code in uppercase, separated by a dash.

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.UserInfo.PhoneNumber
member.summary: User's preferred telephone number.
member.remarks: E.164 is the RECOMMENDED format. If the phone number contains an extension, it is RECOMMENDED that the extension be represented using the RFC 3966 extension syntax.

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.UserInfo.PhoneNumberVerified
member.summary: Whether the user's phone number has been verified or not.
member.remarks: When this Claim Value is true, this means that the OP took affirmative steps to ensure that this phone number was controlled by the user at the time the verification was performed. When true, the phone_number Claim MUST be in E.164 format and any extensions MUST be represented in RFC 3966 format.

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.UserInfo.Address
member.summary: User's preferred postal/mailing address.

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.UserInfo.UpdatedAt
member.summary: Time and date the user's information was last updated.

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.UserInfo.AdditionalClaims
member.summary: Additional claims about the user.

member.name: T:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.UserInfoAddress
member.summary: Represents a physical mailing address of an user.

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.UserInfoAddress.Formatted
member.summary: Full mailing address, formatted for display or use on a mailing label.
member.remarks: MAY contain multiple lines, separated by newlines as either CRLF (Windows) `\r\n` or LF (Unix) `\n`.

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.UserInfoAddress.StreetAddress
member.summary: Full street address component, which MAY include house number, street name, Post Office Box, and multi-line extended street address information.
member.remarks: MAY contain multiple lines, separated by newlines as either CRLF (Windows) `\r\n` or LF (Unix) `\n`.

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.UserInfoAddress.Locality
member.summary: City or locality component of the address.

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.UserInfoAddress.Region
member.summary: State, province, prefecture, or region component of the address.

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.UserInfoAddress.PostalCode
member.summary: Zip or postal code component of the address.

member.name: P:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Models.UserInfoAddress.Country
member.summary: Country component of the address.

member.summary: Perform validation of an ID token in compliance with specified .

member.name: M:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Tokens.IdTokenClaimValidator.AssertClaimsMeetRequirements(Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Tokens.IdTokenRequirements,System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Jwt.JwtSecurityToken,System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Assert that all the claims within a meet the specified for a given point in time.
member.param: that should be asserted.
to assert requirements against.
to act as "Now" when asserting time-based claims.
member.exception: Exception thrown if fails to meet the requirements specified by .

member.summary: Get a epoch (Unix time) value for a given claim.

Type of claim to search the for. See for possible names.
member.returns: Nullable containing the value containing the epoch value or if no matching value was found.

member.summary: Get the value for a given claim.

member.name: T:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Tokens.IdTokenRequirements
member.summary: Identity token validation requirements for use with .

member.name: F:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Tokens.IdTokenRequirements.SignatureAlgorithm
member.summary: Required algorithm the token must be signed using.

member.name: F:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Tokens.IdTokenRequirements.Issuer
member.summary: Required issuer (iss) the token must be from.

member.name: F:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Tokens.IdTokenRequirements.Audience
member.summary: Required audience (aud) the token must be for.

member.name: F:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Tokens.IdTokenRequirements.Nonce
member.summary: Optional one-time nonce the token must be issued in response to.

member.name: F:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Tokens.IdTokenRequirements.MaxAge
member.summary: Optional maximum time since the user last authenticated.

member.name: F:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Tokens.IdTokenRequirements.Leeway
member.summary: Amount of leeway to allow in validating date and time claims in order to allow some clock variance between the issuer and the application.

member.name: F:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Tokens.IdTokenRequirements.Organization
member.summary: Optional organization (org_id) the token must be for.

member.name: M:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Tokens.IdTokenRequirements.#ctor(Auth0.AuthenticationApi.JwtSignatureAlgorithm,System.String,System.String,System.TimeSpan,System.Nullable{System.TimeSpan},System.String)
member.summary: Create a new instance of with specified parameters.
member.param: the id token must be signed with.
Required issuer (iss) the token must be from.
Required audience (aud) the token must be for.
Amount of leeway in validating date and time claims to allow some clock variance between the issuer and the application.
Optional maximum time since the user last authenticated.
Optional organization (org_id) the token must be for.

member.name: T:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Tokens.IdTokenValidationException
member.summary: Exception used to convey ways in which an identity token has failed to be validated.

members.member: Create a new with no error message.

member.name: M:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Tokens.IdTokenValidationException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Create a new with a given error message.
member.param: Message that describes how the token fails to meet validation requirements.

member.name: M:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Tokens.IdTokenValidationException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Create a new that contains a further inner describing how this token could not be validated.
member.param: Message that describes how the token fails to meet validation requirements.
Inner exception that caused this validation exception.

member.name: T:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Tokens.IdTokenValidationKeyMissingException
member.summary: Exception used to convey a token's key could not be found.

members.member: Create a new with no error message.

member.name: M:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Tokens.IdTokenValidationKeyMissingException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Create a new with a given error message.
member.param: Message that describes how the token's key could not be found.

member.name: M:Auth0.AuthenticationApi.Tokens.IdTokenValidationKeyMissingException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Create a new that contains a further inner describing how this token's key could not be found.
member.param: Message that describes how the token fails to meet validation requirements.
Inner exception that caused this validation exception.
